actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Durenberger. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Armstrong for Senator Domenici unfavorably without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 202.
Committee on Budget filed written report. Report No. 97-156.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.43.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 43 (Congressional Budget Office).

titles.title: A original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.43.
